Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Chongqing Jinmaohui Agriculture Co., Ltd. was established on June 22, 2024, with its registered address at No. 1571 Wangpai Road, Pailou Street, Wanzhou District, Chongqing. The legal representative is Zhang Mingmei. The business scope includes licensed projects: manufacturing of soy products; Food sales; Road freight transportation (excluding dangerous goods). (For projects that require approval by law, business activities can only be carried out after approval by relevant departments. Specific business projects shall be subject to the approval documents or licenses issued by relevant departments.) General projects: vegetable cultivation; Wholesale of fresh vegetables; Wholesale of fresh fruits; Wholesale of edible agricultural products; Initial processing of edible agricultural products; Legume cultivation; Labor services (excluding labor dispatch); Grain cultivation; Fruit cultivation; Flower cultivation; Chinese herbal medicine cultivation; Horticultural product cultivation; Planting of aquatic plants; Sales of agricultural and sideline products; Grain sales; Sales of horticultural products; Crop cultivation services; Irrigation services; Crop harvesting services; Purchase of primary agricultural products; Agricultural specialties and auxiliary activities; Crop pest and disease control services; Supply chain management services; Intelligent agricultural management; Agricultural scientific research and experimental development; Technical services, technology development, technology consulting, technology exchange, technology transfer, and technology promotion; General cargo warehousing services (excluding projects requiring permits and approvals such as hazardous chemicals). (Except for projects that require approval according to law, conduct business activities independently based on the business license in accordance with the law)
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Backup of some of the company's public video files
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
We will use the singularity
The following are some of the operating commands

`singularity prep list`
`singularity prep status MyData`
`singularity prep create MyData ~/dataset/folder ~/outDir `
`singularity prep generation-status --dataset MyData <index>`
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
